item.title: Opinion Poll by Verian for SVT, 26 January–8 February 2026 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Liberalerna (RE): 0 seats
  • Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 7–8 seats
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 1 seats
  • Centerpartiet (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 4 seats
  • Sverigedemokraterna (ECR): 4–5 seats
